mapper.select: SELECT userId, userName, userNickname, userImage, userRegdate, petName, petType, email, userTel FROM user WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT p.contentId, p.title, p.addr1, p.addr2, p.firstImage2, p.mapX, p.mapY, b.bookmarkRegdate FROM bookmark b JOIN place p ON b.contentId = p.contentId WHERE b.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY b.bookmarkRegdate DESC
SELECT * FROM post WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY postRegdate DESC
SELECT * FROM comment WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY comRegdate DESC
SELECT * FROM inquiry WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY inquiryRegdate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET userNickname = #{userNickname}, nickResetAt = NOW() WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN nickResetAt IS NULL THEN TRUE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, nickResetAt, NOW()) >= 30 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM user WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT pwd FROM user WHERE userId = #{userId}
